A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I signed up just to post this review.
When movie finished my thoughts were\, "there has to be more."  I sat through the credits hoping there was more\, nope.  When I was driving home I was thinking\, "did I miss something?" 
I just watched Star Wars\, I was supposed to be feeling good/happy to have watched an epic tale.  Why did it feel like it was shallow/hollow?  
I did not want to believe the review from the fans but after watching\, I have to agree.  I am definitely disappointed.  Who do I blame?  Directors? Writers? Disney?  
It was a decent movie\, it was not Star Wars.
